plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and sometimes pretty colors. I need water and sun to grow. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I need to drink!
☀️ I love to be in the warm light.
💐 You can give me as a gift.

plant.question: I am green and grow on trees. Birds like to build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on big, tall things.
🐦 I provide a home for many animals.
🍃 I help make air clean.

plant.question: I am long, orange, and yummy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow in the ground.
🐰 Bugs Bunny loves me!
💪 I can help you see better.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Squirrels love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels bury me for winter.
🌰 I am often brown and round.
🍂 I fall from trees in the autumn.

plant.question: I am a big plant with a thick trunk and branches. I can live for a very long time. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 You can build a house from parts of me.
🦉 Birds and squirrels like to live in me.
🌳 I give you shade on a sunny day.

plant.question: I am red, round, and grow on a vine. You can make juice from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in bunches.
🍷 Grown-ups use me to make a drink.
🍬 Some people like me in jelly form.

plant.question: I have a prickly stem and beautiful flowers. Be careful when you hold me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 People give me to someone they love.
🌵 I have thorns to protect myself.
🔴 I can be red, pink, yellow, or white.

plant.question: I am a grain that grows tall in fields. You can grind me to make flour for bread. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 Farmers grow lots of me!
🍞 You can make yummy things to eat with me.
🟡 I am yellow when I am ripe.

plant.question: I am a seed that grows into a tall plant. You can pop me and eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I taste good with butter and salt.
🌽 I grow on a cob.
🟡 I am yellow when I am not popped.

plant.question: I am a very tall tree that can live for thousands of years. I am known for my reddish-brown bark. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I am one of the tallest trees in the world.
🐻 I am found in California.
🪵 My wood is used to build things.

bug.question: I have six legs and like to march. I carry crumbs back to my home. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I'm very small.
💪 I'm known for being strong for my size.
🍕 I like to eat dropped food.

bug.question: I can fly and I like flowers. I make something sweet for you to eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🌼 I visit lots of colorful things.
🐝 I buzz when I fly.
🍯 I make something sticky and yummy.

bug.question: I am red with black spots, and I am considered lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I'm round and small.
🟢 Gardeners like me because I eat other bugs.
🔴 I'm usually red or orange.

bug.question: I jump very high, have long legs, and eat plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to hang out in grassy areas.
🟢 I am usually green.
🎶 You might hear me chirping.

bug.question: I change my look as I grow. First, I crawl, then I fly with beautiful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I start as something that eats leaves.
🦋 I go through a big change called metamorphosis.
🌈 I have colorful wings.

bug.question: I live in a web that I spin. I have eight legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I trap my food.
🕷️ I'm not an insect, but an arachnid.
👀 I have many eyes.

bug.question: I come out at night and flash a light. What am I?

hints.text: 🌃 You see me when it's dark
💡 I glow!
🪲 I'm a type of beetle.

bug.question: I have long, skinny legs and big eyes. I can fly very fast and like to eat mosquitoes. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I live near water.
🦋 I can be very colorful.
🦟 I help get rid of pesky insects.

bug.question: I make a buzzing sound, and only the females bite you. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I leave itchy bumps!
🧛 Only the girls like your blood
🌌 I can ruin a nice evening outside

bug.question: I look like a stick, and hide in trees so birds do not see me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 My camouflage is very good.
🌿 I eat leaves.
🚶 I look like part of the plant.
